name: This is [not] a Drill
description:
HI! Toska here.

TINAD is a very short game (2-5 minutes sessions) with bunch of semi-funny jokes and ADULT TOPICS!!!!!!

  • RMB + LMB — pick choice
  •  A — Autoplay
  • LMB — next speechbuuble

Made for GameJam in my uni. Please enjoy. 

After pressing retry please refresh the page to play again!
